response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and dedication. I believe its true worth surpasses $1,500,000, but I am open to discussing the terms to ensure both parties are satisfied.

To make this offer more appealing, I am willing to consider various payment options, including installment plans, to facilitate a smooth transaction. I understand that the value of this product may be subjective to you, and I am here to listen to your thoughts and preferences.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further, and we can arrange a time that suits you best. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable item into your collection.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1500000}
